Interface FieldRenderer<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentStatusRenderer, DateRenderer, DateTimeRenderer, LowStockIndicatorRenderer, MedicationRenderer, StringRenderer, TimeRenderer
public interface FieldRenderer<T>
The FieldRenderer class allow the PaginationTableScreen to display custom field with different type

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getLines()
    Returns the number of lines this field will take up when rendered
    void
    initRenderObject(Object rowValue, Object fieldValue, int fieldWidth)
    Initialise the Field Renderer object and setting up values based on a row's data.
    void
    render(ConsoleInterface consoleInterface, int line, int fieldWidth)
    Handles the actual rendering of the field.

  • Method Details

    • initRenderObject

      void initRenderObject(Object rowValue, Object fieldValue, int fieldWidth)
      Initialise the Field Renderer object and setting up values based on a row's data.
      Parameters:
      rowValue - Represents the data for the entire row.
      fieldValue - Represents the specific field data for the cell being rendered.
      fieldWidth - Specifies the width for the field display.

    • render

      void render(ConsoleInterface consoleInterface, int line, int fieldWidth)
      Handles the actual rendering of the field.
      Parameters:
      consoleInterface - The instance of the ConsoleInterface used for printing to the console
      line - Which line is currently being rendered
      fieldWidth - Specifies the width for the field display.

    • getLines

      int getLines()
      Returns the number of lines this field will take up when rendered
      Returns:
      The number of lines this field
